attributes.action: Declare invalid the EU referendum whose result was based on misinformation.
attributes.additional_details:
Nigel Farage has admitted that making the claim in question was a mistake. 

http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/brexit-eu-referendum-nigel-farage-nhs-350-million-pounds-live-health-service-u-turn-a7102831.html

http://www.theguardian.com/politics/2016/jun/25/leave-campaign-rows-back-key-pledges-immigration-nhs-spending

http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/brexit-anger-bregret-leave-voters-protest-vote-thought-uk-stay-in-eu-remain-win-a7102516.html
attributes.background: We  the undersigned wish the UK government to declare invalid the EU referendum of 2016 on the grounds that the Leave campaign misled the electorate with a false claim that Britain gives £350m a week to Brussels and that this money would be spent on the NHS if the UK left the EU.
